author: _exile_
title: Incredible!
review:
This might be my favourite build yet! It has so many features that would be the signature piece in any other set, and yet its a secondary or tertiary piece in this. Aside from the price, which was steep here in Canada, I can't say enough good things about this one! I mean there's a freaking rollercoaster on it!

The only knock I have and it could be sheer ignorance as I haven't seen the movie, but I don't understand Batman having rooms in the Joker Manor. It just seems out of place for Bruce to have a recording studio in it. However, it is pretty cool.

All in all, I do not regret spending a little more than I would for a Batman set. It's one of my all time favourite overall sets!
